DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: The ceiling of this cavern must be a mile up, but the black cold waters of the lake seem to cover almost the entire floor. You are on the perfectly still waters of a cold black lake.

DISPLAY.DISPLAY: $mob_name is trying to hide from you.
$mob_name is trying to hide from you.
